GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.15.64
GSD.description:
bootmem: remove the vmemmap pages from kmemleak in put_page_bootmem

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.64 by commit 16a12ee619e39e8112f61b603255c16b73b6264b, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit f41f2ed43ca5258d70d53290d1951a21621f95c8. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: bootmem: remove the vmemmap pages from kmemleak in put_page_bootmem
